data moduleïƒ

Data loading classes for multimodal and unimodal data. This file contains functions and classes for loading the data for the different modalities, and in training the subspace methods on the data (if the subspace methods need pre-training). Train/test splits and k-fold cross validation are also implemented here.

class CustomDataModule(params, fusion_model, sources, batch_size, subspace_method=None, image_downsample_size=None, layer_mods=None, max_epochs=1000, extra_log_string_dict=None, own_early_stopping_callback=None)[source]ïƒ

Bases: LightningDataModule

Custom pytorch lightning datamodule class for the different modalities.

List of source csv files.

Type:

list

Size to downsample the images to (height, width, depth) or (height, width) for 2D images.

Type:

tuple

Dictionary of methods for loading the different modalities.

Type:

dict

fusion model class. e.g. â€œTabularCrossmodalAttentionâ€.

Type:

Batch size (default 8).

Type:

Fraction of data to use for testing (default 0.2).

Prediction type (binary, multiclass, regression).

Type:

Number of classes for multiclass prediction (default None).

__init__(params, fusion_model, sources, batch_size, subspace_method=None, image_downsample_size=None, layer_mods=None, max_epochs=1000, extra_log_string_dict=None, own_early_stopping_callback=None)[source]ïƒ
Parameters:

  • params (dict) â€“ Dictionary of parameters.

  • fusion_model (str) â€“ Fusion model class. e.g. â€œTabularCrossmodalAttentionâ€.

  • sources (list) â€“ List of source csv files.

  • batch_size (int) â€“ Batch size (default 8).

  • subspace_method (class) â€“ Subspace method class (default None) (only for subspace methods).

  • image_downsample_size (tuple) â€“ Size to downsample the images to (height, width, depth) or (height, width) for 2D images. None if not downsampling. (default None)

  • layer_mods (dict) â€“ Dictionary of layer modifications to make to the subspace method. (default None)

  • max_epochs (int) â€“ Maximum number of epochs to train subspace methods for. (default 1000)

  • extra_log_string_dict (dict) â€“ Dictionary of extra strings to add to the log.

  • own_early_stopping_callback (pytorch_lightning.callbacks.EarlyStopping) â€“ Early stopping callback class (default None).

Raises:

ValueError â€“ If fusion_model.modality_type is not one of the following: tabular1, tabular2, img, both_tab, tab_img.

prepare_data()[source]ïƒ

Loads the data with LoadDatasets class

Returns:

  • dataset (tensor) â€“ Tensor of predictive features.

  • data_dims (list) â€“ List of data dimensions [mod1_dim, mod2_dim, img_dim] i.e. [None, None, [100, 100, 100]] for image only (image dimensions 100 x 100 x 100) i.e. [8, 32, None] for tabular1 and tabular2 (tabular1 has 8 features, tabular2 has 32 features), and no image

Splits the data into train and test sets, and runs the subspace method if specified

  • val_dataloader (dataloader) â€“ Dataloader for validation.

Raises:

ValueError â€“ If pred_features is not a list or tensor.

  • params (dict) â€“ Dictionary of parameters.

  • fusion_model (class) â€“ Fusion model class. e.g. â€œTabularCrossmodalAttentionâ€.

  • sources (list) â€“ List of source csv files.

  • batch_size (int) â€“ Batch size (default 8).

  • subspace_method (class) â€“ Subspace method class (default None) (only for subspace methods).

  • image_downsample_size (tuple) â€“ Size to downsample the images to (height, width, depth) or (height, width) for 2D images. None if not downsampling. (default None)

  • layer_mods (dict) â€“ Dictionary of layer modifications to make to the subspace method. (default None)

  • max_epochs (int) â€“ Maximum number of epochs to train subspace methods for. (default 1000)

  • extra_log_string_dict (dict) â€“ Dictionary of extra strings to add to the log.

  • own_early_stopping_callback (pytorch_lightning.callbacks.EarlyStopping) â€“ Early stopping callback class (default None).

Raises:

ValueError â€“ If fusion_model.modality_type is not one of the following: tabular1, tabular2, img, both_tab, tab_img.

class LoadDatasets(sources, img_downsample_dims=None)[source]ïƒ

Bases: object

Class for loading the different datasets for the different modalities.

Source csv file for tabular1 data.

Type:

str

Source csv file for tabular2 data.

Type:

str

img_sourceïƒ

Source torch file for image data.

Type:

str

image_downsample_sizeïƒ

Size to downsample the images to (height, width, depth) or (height, width) for 2D images. None if not downsampling. (default None)

Type:

tuple

__init__(sources, img_downsample_dims=None)[source]ïƒ
Parameters:

  • sources (list) â€“ List of source csv files. [tabular1_source, tabular2_source, img_source]

  • img_downsample_dims (tuple) â€“ Size to downsample the images to (height, width, depth) or (height, width) for 2D images. None if not downsampling. (default None)

Raises:

  • ValueError â€“ If sources is not a list.

  • ValueError â€“ If the CSVs do not have the right columns or if the index column is not named â€œstudy_idâ€.

downsample_img_batch(imgs, output_size)[source]ïƒ

Downsamples a batch of images to a specified size.

Parameters:

  • imgs (array-like) â€“ Batch of images. Shape (batch_size, channels, height, width) or (batch_size, channels, height, width, depth) for 3D images.

  • output_size (tuple) â€“ Size to downsample the images to (height, width) or (height, width, depth) for 3D images. Do not put the batch_size dimension in the tuple. If None, no downsampling is performed

Returns:

downsampled_img â€“ Downsampled image.

Return type:

array-like

get_data_module(fusion_model, params, batch_size=8, image_downsample_size=None, layer_mods=None, max_epochs=1000, optional_suffix='', checkpoint_path=None, extra_log_string_dict=None, own_early_stopping_callback=None)[source]ïƒ

Gets the data module for the specified modality and fusion type.

Parameters:

  • fusion_model (class) â€“ Fusion model class.

  • params (dict) â€“ Dictionary of parameters.

  • batch_size (int) â€“ Batch size (default 8).

  • image_downsample_size (list) â€“ List of image dimensions to downsample to (default None).

  • layer_mods (dict) â€“ Dictionary of layer modifications (default None).

  • optional_suffix (str) â€“ Optional suffix added to data source file names (default None).

  • checkpoint_path (str) â€“ Path to call checkpoint file (default None will result in the default lightning format).

  • extra_log_string_dict (dict) â€“ Dictionary of extra strings to add to a subspace method checkpoint file name (default None). e.g. if youâ€™re running the same model with different hyperparameters, you can add the hyperparameters. Input format {â€œnameâ€: â€œvalueâ€}. In the run name, the extra string will be added as â€œname_valueâ€. And a tag will be added as â€œname_valueâ€. Default None.

  • own_early_stopping_callback (pytorch_lightning.callbacks.EarlyStopping) â€“ Early stopping callback class (default None).

Returns:

dm â€“ Datamodule for the specified fusion method.

Return type:

datamodule
